entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:38 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:38 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:38 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
